Title: Stop New Muslim Sister from being homeless!
Description: Salaam.     I’m currently in a serious situation  I embraced islam a number of years ago  I have one young child and If I don’t raise enough money for rented accommodation I may well become homeless. I hate asking for money but this is my last resort. May Allah reward you for your support and make it a means for you to enter Firdous  ameen.

Title: Area 260 fundraiser 4 Calderwood House
Description: Our mission is to provide an innovative solution to homelessness and unemployment in Copeland. Our team provides round the clock support to our residents. We work closely with Copeland Council to support the “Everybody In” campaign and to strive for zero homelessness in the area. There are particular challenges for ex-military personnel who can struggle to adjust to civilian life  so we also prioritise access for them.

Title: Action against homelessness
Description: Homelessness is serious issue that is only getting worse in Newcastle under lyme. The rate of people seeking help from homelessness charities is increasing year on year.     People become homeless for lots of different reasons  including a lack of affordable housing  poverty and unemployment. People can be forced into homelessness when they leave prison  or when they escape a violent or abusive relationship. On average  people in the UK are only three paydays away from becoming homeless. Nearly all cases of homelessness are preventable  and every case can be ended  with the right funding and support.     in 2021 over 227 000 families were experiencing homelessness  including 126 000 children. It is estimated that 1 in 96 people are homeless in the West Midlands. We (Courtney Baddeley and Callum Fox) are organising a sleep out to help out in order to raise money for homelessness in the local area of Newcastle under lyme. We will be spending the whole night on the 14th may on the streets of the town centre to see first hand the struggles that a lot of people face everyday.    100% of funds raised are going to the Macari Foundation.

Title: Climbing The 3 Peaks - VCS FC
Location: Central Drawing Office Services (Yorkshire) Ltd, Yorkshire and the Humber, United Kingdom
Description: Josh & the VCS United FC - football team are decending onto the 3 peaks in 3 weeks time - to help us carry on the vital work we do - we could do with your help !!!     Vulnerable Citizen Support C.I.C - assist with the most vulnerable & destitute people in society we help with housing - emergency accommodation - mental health calls - food parcels & much more.....     Recently we have helped many people find a home & that's only been with the help of people like you - who are reading this - ❤️   We have been supporting a young female for around 3/4 months - supporting her with hotel costs to save her from having to go into a hostel ❤️    We have now managed to connect with a landlord in a beautiful area - that's happy to let this young individual live there because we don't have time for LCC to carry out inspections which could take up to 5/6 weeks - which in this time the property will be gone ❤️ We now have confirmation that it's ours if we can raise some funds ❤️    Happy to accept DSS moving forward & happy for who we have moving in - we will also be working with this individual going forward ❤️     We also need help in what we do day to day and anything extra we raise will be spent on the running of VCS - as our day to day expense is quite costly ❤️    Thank you

Title: Home 4 the homeless
Location: Oldham, North West England, United Kingdom
Description: Hi everyone I’m fundraising for a young man called SIAB from Pakistan AJK Mirpur new city.    SIAB is blind and his wife is partially blind and with them having a 2 year old baby girl  they are homeless and have no help.    We have decided to help them with already purchasing a 5 Marla plot of land.  Now we are in need of go fund me to help us so we can purchase materials and resources so that the couple and baby have a safe home to

Title: help Kelly Eastwood-
Location: Saint Leonards-on-Sea, South East England, United Kingdom
Description: Hi everyone-   My name is Kelly  I am 22 years old.   living in the south of the uk     I have been really struggling to feed myself and my dog Tiny.   my son passed away last april (2021) and I haven’t been able to pick myself up to work.   before this I was a bin lady working on the dust carts- I enjoyed this very much but unfortunately couldn’t continue due to the grief of my son who was born sleeping.    I feel like this is the only way I can revive help  most days me and my dog can’t eat.   And I’m very close to giving up   Please donate to me and help me get on my feet-
